items.title: Application Launched
items.description: The application is now live on a public domain for initial testing and feedback.

items.title: PLG CMMS Credentials
items.description: All credentials will be sent today

items.title: Requirements and fixings collection
items.description: The CMMS Development Team will continue receiving your feedback until 15/08/2025.

items.title: Fixings and Improving phase
items.description: Based on the feedback received during testing, the development team will set a deadline for upgrades and fixes, and will communicate it to all stakeholders.

items.title: PLG FUSECON Tablet Count
items.description: How many tablets are available for CMMS use?

items.title: APK (Android App) Delivery on Demand
items.description: Depending on the number of available tablets for CMMS, the corresponding APK will be sent for app installation.
